thread.title: Poachers in Hluhluwe push rhino death toll to 75
thread.title_full: Poachers in Hluhluwe push rhino death toll to 75 | News24

author: news24.com
title: Poachers in Hluhluwe push rhino death toll to 75
text:
ONE rhino died and two others were wounded after poachers darted and dehorned them in Hluhluwe Game Reserve on Monday afternoon.
The three white rhinos were found on Monday, pushing the total number of rhino poached in KwaZulu-Natal to 75 so far this year.
Ezemvelo KZN Wildlife spokesperson Musa Mntambo said all three ­rhinos had had their front horns removed and two had survived the ordeal.
“We suspect the rhinos were darted. One was found dead, but the other two were alive and we took them to the boma where they were attended to by the vet.”
